title: Please add a Toxic queue
body:
Please add a casual queue so I don't get another game where the 0/17 yasuo and his 2/15 buddy kayn don't strike up a conversation with the enemy team and they constantly 3/2 the surrender vote so we get entrapped in a 40 minute game. 

We're not even allowed to AFK or swear because that would be toxic

My suggestion is to add a toxic queue where we can freely swear and int and and use racial slurs. 
In return you can make the other queues even more safe space SJW zero tolerance  or whatever.

It's not a prisoner island because this is a queue I would gladly pick and it's not removing the "playerbase" because these are toxic people you don't want to play with to begin with
